::: {.callout-note}
Since our capacity for the practical exercises is limited, we will only be able to accept **~50 participants** for the workshop.
However, the lectures will also be available via livestream, and everyone is invited to follow along independently.
:::

To register for the free Unfold.jl workshop, please fill out the form below. 
We will inform you via email if you got a place and share the Zoom link.
